features: Holds up to 24 L of food and drinks
TempShield™ Soft insulation keeps cold up to 48 hours

Advanced Thermal Mapping with Ultralon Buoyancy Foam means less bulk, less weight and more comfort —helps eliminate temperature transfer with 20 mm thickness on bottom and top 
and 10 mm on front and back
True Access Top opening for easy access and easy cleaning
840D Nylon Double Sided Extrusion FDA Food Grade insulated, mildew-resistant anti-microbial BPA-free liner
Welded seams for waterproof exterior and interior
Soft, yet durable 420 D Nylon Waterproof shell
Soft, rounded 820X scratch-resistant base with double-sided extrusion for free-standing capabilities
Dry storage compartment with 2 leakproof, easyopen zipper pockets
Comfortable stretch woven shoulder strap and hand carry straps
